title: PBE Sign up issues
body: I tried signing up for the PBE, checked my eligibility and it said I was eligible. Typed in my preferred username and password and clicked "sign me up" but it gave me the message "Something went wrong. Please refresh and try again". So I did what the message said and it still gave me the same message.

replies.body: That website has been under a heavy load since it recently launched, causing a lot of players to get this message. Basically, it's just been overloaded from all the traffic and you should be able to get through eventually =\ .
Do you know  how much time this will take?
hey, uhh, it comes in a very strange language when i try to download it- is this normal? can i fix it later? please help
